data.message: Mike Honcho & Anthony Schwickrath, you'll get a kick out of all these "lifelong fans" who didn't realize Em has been political & left-leaning for decades. I can't. 🤦🏼‍♀️

replies.message: not knowing that makes them not true fans. like Donnie Sttrraz
SMH.. I can think of Mosh, We as Americans, Square Dance, and White America just off of the top of my head.
If you didn't think he was political then you didn't listen to his music. Fake fans.
Kinda betrying his politics isn't he? He's on the side with speech restrictions and hate crimes now .. how does that make any sense with Em from 2000? He's turning on the thing that made him.

Weird. I recall Trump's campaign manager threatening critics of the POTUS and the DOJ under this administration requesting information of anti-Trump websites. He's not betraying his views at all. He probably just views the need for a platform for white supremacists as a non-issue in regards to rights. It makes perfect sense.
delusional smh

its funny that eminem did a fake presidential skit with trump on mtv years ago...he didnt have a problem with him till he ran on the  Republican  ticket...now  thats a fake dude....youtube eminem/trump mtv skit....the hypocricy is dumbfounding
https://youtu.be/2NBwt24PTe0
now thats some hypocritical shit...im ashamed at em

I remember. So what. At the time Trump was just a shady real estate mogul and D-List celebrity. He wasn't imposing government policies Em doesn't agree with. Nothing fake about that. If he went back to being a citizen, the problem would be resolved. It's not hypocrisy. There are plenty of people I like as actors that I would have issue with if they ran for public office.
Did you also think Em was actually running for president? 😂
This is the same guy who trashed bill and Hilary now he hates Trump? He's a hypocrite I'm starting to believe he's a clone cus 90's em would never do this

He may have trashed the Clintons, but nowhere near the extent that he trashed Bush. He openly endorsed Obama in 08, and had some criticisms around his second term. He's criticized both sides, but has been clearly harsher on the GOP. 90s Em would have done exactly the same. He's not a hypocrite. You just misjudged him. This is comical. I'm sure he's worrying about all the "fans" he's losing.

Eva Mozdzen no i didnt think mr mathers was running..obviously....im just pointing out how he was loved before he ran on a Republican ticket...now hes public enemy #1....anyway,  im going back to CNN later..

You should also point out then at the time Trump had very different political views. Watch his interview with Larry King from '99ish when he formed an exploratory committee at the possibility of running as an independent.
Nothing says "left" quite like making songs about killing women and hating gays, amirite?

🙄 There's no denying that his lyrics are plagued with sexist and homophobic remarks. I'll take actions over insensitive and insulting art any day of the week. In 2010 in a NYT Magazine interview he answered he would support a gay marriage bill in MI. Am I to believe a man who is such a womanizer has a clean rap sheet when it comes to sexual assault and domestic violence charges or accusations? I'd be tickled pink if all men that opposed lgbtq rights and were wife beaters in reality chose to write offensive songs instead.
I hated his whiney flow since day one. Nails on a chalkboard.
That explains why you are on his page. I'm sure he's devastated.
They dont understand Eminem. They just like how he says controversial things. Eminem voted for Obama. XD
Michael Decampos He didn't have a problem with him then cause Trump wasn't in control of the country and fucking up everything. lol Yah'll just don't get it.
I'm no Stan but look out for my project on cloud coming soon!
Sound cloud that is
